cards.title: Growing Up is Tough!
cards.centerfold: Happy Birthday! Remember, age is just a number—like the number of times you can eat cake without feeling guilty. So go ahead, celebrate like you just discovered a magical land of unlimited ice cream! Just don’t forget to leave some for the grown-ups… maybe.
cards.artistInspiration: vibrant neo-expressionist style with ornate floral backgrounds and bold color fields
